name: Little Root Golf
description:
Little Root Golf

Created for Global Game Jam Vancouver 2023

Help the Tree Spirit collect all the Sun and Water for the Tree Heart! 

Controls: 
Click and Drag Mouse to fling 
Spacebar to reset models

Team NICE FREAKIN TREES
